description: This is an example of i18n in React.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of your dashboard.
accentColorDescription: Choose a color that suits your brand.
fontStyleDescription: Choose a font style that suits your preference.
languagesDescription: Choose a language that suits your preference.
profileVisibilityDescription: Profile visible only to connections or specific users.
activityStatusDescription: Toggle to show or hide online status from others.
collectedDataDescription: Option to export/download all user data in a structured format.
deleteAccountDescription: Option to delete the account and all associated data permanently.
